question: Which one of the following answers describes a test condition?
options: A distinguishing characteristic of a component or system
A testable aspect of a component or system identified as a basis for testing
The degree to which a software product provides functions which meet stated and implied needs when the software is used under specified conditions
Test cases designed to execute combinations of conditions and actions resulting from them
answers: a) Is not correct. Definition of feature according to glossary
c) Is not correct. Definition of functionality suitability according to glossary
d) Is not correct. Like Definition of Decision table testing according to glossary
